text: eman walo! Tum say tumhari milkiyat kay ghulamon ko aur unhen bhi jo tum mein say balooghat ko na phonchay hon (apnay aaney ki) teen waqton mein ijazat hasil kerni zaroori hai. Namaz-e-fajar say pehlay aur zohar kay waqt jab kay tum apnay kapray utar rakhtay ho aur isha ki namaz kay baad yeh teeno waqt tumhari (khilwat) aur parday kay hain. Inn waqton kay ma-siwa na to tum per koi gunah hai na unn per. Tum sab aapas mein aik doosray kay pass ba-kasrat aaney janey walay ho (hi) Allah iss tarah khol khol ker apnay ehkaam tum say biyan farma raha hai. Allah Taalaa pooray ilm aur kamil hikmat wala hai
